FuncDef:
The delay-measure enable one-way tlp command enables on-demand one-way delay measurement for an IP Flow Performance Monitor (IP FPM) instance.
The delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point command enables delay measurement on a mid-point.
The delay-measure enable one-way continual command enables proactive one-way delay measurement for an IP Flow Performance Monitor (IP FPM) instance.
The undo delay-measure enable command disables proactive delay measurement of an IP FPM instance.
The undo delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point command disables delay measurement on a mid-point.
By default, proactive one-way delay measurement of an IP FPM instance and on-demand one-way delay measurement and of an IP FPM instance are disabled, delay measurement is disabled on a mid-point from an IP Flow Performance Monitor (IP FPM) instance..
CLIs: delay-measure enable one-way tlp <tlp-id> [ continual | time-range <time-range> ]
delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point [ continual | time-range <time-range> ]
delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point [ time-range <time-range> ]
undo delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point [ continual ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the statistical period for on-demand one-way delay measurement.
The value is an integer that can be 5, 10, 15, or 30, in minutes.
The default value is 10 m.

Specifies a TLP ID for proactive one-way delay measurement.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 16777215.

Enables delay measurement on a mid-point.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI-nqa-ipfpm-dcp-instance-1] delay-measure enable one-way tlp mid-point time-range 30
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The IP FPM performance statistics serve as a reliable reference for assessing IP network performance and therefore are useful for fault diagnosis and service statistics.
To monitor one-way delay performance in a specified period, run the delay-measure enable one-way command.To diagnose network faults and locate faulty nodes when network performance deteriorates, run the delay-measure enable mid-point command.To detect faults when network performance deteriorates and monitor proactive one-way delay performance, run the delay-measure enable one-way continual command.

Prerequisites
An IP FPM model has been established, including configuring a DCP and MCP, binding a TLP to a physical interface, and creating a target flow and IP FPM instance.
Precautions
If a master/slave switchover is performed, or the device is restarted, delay measurement on the mid-point or on-demand one-way delay measurement will become invalid. You must reconfigure the function.
On-demand one-way delay measurement cannot function together with on-demand or proactive two-way delay measurement.
Proactive one-way delay measurement cannot function together with on-demand or proactive two-way delay measurement.
